discription.title: Women's Dark Navy Skirt Suit
discription.description: Made in Italy from a linen composition this dark navy skirt suit features a double-breasted blazer and maxi-length skirt. The blazer is cut to a straight fit with subtle shaping to the back and an exaggerated peak lapel for a feminine feel. The blazer features contrast 'Signature Stripe' lining trims for a distinctive touch. The maxi skirt is the perfect transitional piece for seasonal styling. Complete with partial viscose lining, the skirt features twin side pockets, button fastened pockets to the back, concealed zip fly, belt loops, and contrast button fastening to the waistband, effortlessly combining functionality and style.

discription.title: Women's Sea Green Wool Suit
discription.description: Made in Portugal from a rich wool hopsack composition, this sea-green suit features a single-button blazer and wide-leg trousers. The blazer has jetted pockets, a contrast lining, and four button cuffs. The trousers have a pleated front, soft viscose lining, and angled side pockets.
